title: GetUserLicenseValue (Method)
text:
METHOD GetUserLicenseValue : UDINT
This method allows to ask for the license value of a component (specified by udiLicenseID)

rows: Possible values:0no valid license installed16#FFFFFFFFdemo mode (lasts for 30 min)elselicense value; interpretation depends on component
license value; interpretation depends on component
license value; interpretation depends on component

rows.Name: udiLicenseID
rows.Comment:
ID of the component that asks for its license value
(centrally assigned by 3S)

rows.no valid license installed: license value; interpretation depends on component
